title: STAB
long_description: STAB helps to maximize the efficiency of non-stabilized chlorine by preventing chlorine loss due to ultraviolet rays. With STAB, chlorine will last 3 to 5 times longer in pool water.
short_description: BENEFIT Maintains non-stabilized chlorine in water FORMATS 1.6 kg and 16 kg

characteristics.title: Recommended levels
characteristics.text: The ideal range is 30-50 ppm of stabilizer. Maintaining this level will keep chlorine residuals under control. Levels are determined with a stabilizer test kit.

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Add STAB in the skimmer basket.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Make any necessary adjustments according to the application method and recommended dosage. Wait 15 minutes before entering the pool after adding the product.

dosage.specifications: Add 300 g of STAB per 10,000 L of pool water to reach 30 ppm.

columns.name: POOL SIZE
rows: TO INCREASE STABILIZER LEVEL BY 10 ppm

warning: DO NOT apply the product when people are in the pool.
